irish: feasacht a fhorbairt ar thionchair dhathanna teolaí, dhathanna fionnuara, dhathanna comhlántacha, dhathanna comhchuí agus athruithe ton

strand_title: An awareness of colour and tone
english: mix and use subtle colours and tones and create rhythm, emphasis, contrast, spatial effects, mood and atmosphere in two and three dimensional work
irish: dathanna agus toin fíneálta a mheascadh agus rithim, treise, codarsnacht, imeartas spásúlach agus atmaisféar a chruthú i saothar déthoiseach agus i saothar tríthoiseach

english: explore the relationship between how things feel and how they look
irish: an gaol idir mothú agus cuma rudaí a iniúchadh

english: create variety, contrast and emphasis in surface textures using a range of materials and tools
irish: feidhm a bhaint as raon d'ábhair agus d'uirlisí chun éagsúlacht, codarsnacht agus treise a chruthú in uigeacht dromchlaí

english: use a variety of drawing instruments to suggest texture from observation of objects
irish: raon d'uirlisí líníochta a úsáid chun uigeacht ábhar a ndearnadh breathnú orthu a chur in iúl

strand_title: An awareness of pattern and rhythm
english: analyse pattern in the visual environment through drawing, painting and other media: peeling birch bark, the waves on the sea, scaffolding, fishing nets, stone buildings
irish: gréas san amharcthimpeallacht a anailísiú trí líníocht, phéinteáil agus mheáin eile; coirt bheithe agus í ag scamhadh, toinn ar an bhfarraige, scafall, líonta iascaigh, foirgnimh chloiche

strand_title: An awareness of pattern and rhythm
english: use repetition and variation of line, shape, texture, colour and tone to create contrasting and harmonious effects
irish: athchóipeáil agus athrú líne, crutha, uigeachta, datha agus toin a úsáid chun torthaí comhchuí nó codarsnacha a chruthú

english: continue to develop awareness of how people and objects occupy space
irish: leanúint d'fheasacht air go líonann daoine agus rudaí spás a fhorbairt

english: develop basic understanding of aerial and linear perspective (spatial organisation)
irish: tuiscint bhunúsach a fhorbairt ar pheirspictíocht aerga agus líneach (eagrú spásúlach)

english: design and construct a model with multiple spaces, open and closed: with cells, rooms, enclosures
irish: samhail a dhearadh agus a chruthú le hiliomad spásanna, idir oscailte agus dhúnta: cillíní, seomraí, clóis
